modules.description: Implements a GraphQL server for exposing Irmin store operations over HTTP. It allows clients to query and manipulate Irmin repositories using GraphQL queries, handling concurrent access and clock synchronization. Useful for building remote interfaces to versioned, immutable data stores with real-time collaboration features.

Implements a GraphQL server for exposing Irmin stores over HTTP, enabling clients to query and mutate versioned data via typed schemas. It operates on Irmin's commit graphs and node values, supporting operations like branch traversal, history inspection, and atomic updates. Useful for building version-controlled APIs with fine-grained access to persistent, structured data.
